children.value:
This is a Unity3d game that generates a box fractal. Once generated, there is a
custom input map to an Xbox controller that allows for manipulation of the
different "generations" of fractals.

export const _frontmatter = {"title":"Fractal Generator","date":"2016-04-11T00:00:00.000Z","excerpt":"Interactive Unity3d build of a box fractal","categories":["art"],"tags":["mathematics","unity","video","visualization"],"featured_image":"/images/feature/4.jpg","comments":true,"share":true}
